name: Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. CLERK OF COMMON PLEAS COURT, PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Vurimindi v. Clerk of Common Pleas Court, Philadelphia

parties: Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. CLERK OF COMMON PLEAS COURT, PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
127 A.3d 1291
Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. CLERK OF COMMON PLEAS COURT, PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 134 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 10, 2015.
